    • Method Detail

      • addVocabulary

        void addVocabulary(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> voca)
        adds new vocabulary to this Speechrecognition module.
        Every String that contains " " will be splitted.
        Parameters:
        voca -

      • recordWord

        java.lang.String recordWord(int seconds)
        This method starts a recording session for a single word!
        The word must be in the vocabulary list getVocabulary().
        The (int seconds) parameter determines how long the module
        is listening to the user.
        The parameter will be normalized to the interval (0,1,...,9,10).
        It returns a word from the vocabulary that matches with
        the highest probability.
        Parameters:
        seconds -
        Returns:
